summary: Replace your grindstone sounds with quieter versions up to -10db lower volume in -2db increments.
descriptionHtml:
[heading][color=#f6dc76]No More Loud Grindstone[/color][/heading]
[color=#ffb000][b]Lower Grindstone Sounds v1.0[/b][/color][color=#46738e]   02-24-13[/color]

[color=#46738e]===============================================================================================================================[/color]
[color=#ffb000][b]DESCRIPTION[/b][/color]
[color=#46738e]===============================================================================================================================[/color]
Just a simple sound file replacement mod to lower the volume of the grindstone. Can be reduced by -2, -4, -6, -8 or -10db. Use the NMM installer or install only one folder if installing manually.


[color=#46738e]===============================================================================================================================[/color]
[color=#b77e00][b]MY SKYRIM MODS[/b][/color]
[color=#46738e]===============================================================================================================================[/color]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14976] Atlas Map Markers with Dragonborn, Dawnguard and Blackreach addons [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2345] Reduce Grass Density [/url]
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/15991] Vanity Camera Rotation Speed[/url]

If you like any authors mod, please support them and endorse it to keep the community alive, they deserve it. Thank You
author: Kronixx
